Articles.Content: Lets say I want to host a continuously running game server for myself, and a few friends, or a youtuber wants to create a community server for viewers to mess around on. What kind of options are available to do this? Personally, I would prefer a dedicated program that I can deploy on a spare computer, vm or even a cloud service, similar to how games like minecraft or arma handle dedicated servers, alongside a simpler system like portal 2 or left for dead where servers are p2p and are only up as long as the host is playing the game.
Nobody knows until they release more information about multiplayer.

there will probably be a way to host continious servers.  tho i would probably avoid these servers myself atleast in the begining and i feel like people would rush the game and spoil all the other systems and planets that i would like to discover myself
